inn1.comm: on target, length ball, middle and leg, swinging towards off, defended
short of a length, just outside off, pushed to cover
fuller, similar line just outside off, left alone to swing away

that's a ripper. Kicking off from nowhere, and swinging away too. Sanga nearly blown away by it. Short of a length, on off, jags away, and bounces too. Hafeez is squared up, and edges it, for Sangakarra to catch it in front of his throat. His face shows he is stunned by the carry
steers the first ball he faces to third man for a single
left on bounce. Short of a length, over off, and he makes way for it to pass through to Sanga
really really close lbw call. Kula starts with an inswinger bang on target. Just short of a length, jagging back in for the top of off, and he is saved by a little inside edge
floats the straighter one outside off, Shafiq drives, but straight to cover
short of a length, outside off, left alone
wide ball, short of a length, moving away after pitching, well past the while line, but not called a wide
nearly edged. Straighter one from Kula again, Shafiq plays for the inswinger, and is beaten wide outside off
and now he he has left alone an inswinger, which passes by at the fifth-stump line
short of a length, outside off, allowed to go through to Sanga
slightly fuller, straighter, defended in front of off
digs this one in short, 144.3ks, raring towards chest, not quite coming on too. Shafiq stands tall, and keeps this down
left alone just outside off, moving away towards the slips
another short delivery, a proper bouncer that goes higher than the shoulder, and he sways out of the line
length ball, swinging away, presents a slightly open face, and it races off it to fetch him a couple between cover and extra cover
inswinger,a  touch too short, comfortably pushed back
another inswinger, slightly fuller, and he stays back and defends
slightly short of a length, moving in, defended again
full inswigner, push-drives off the front foot, towards mid-off
the straighter one this time, left alone outside off
lovely cover-drive. Pitched up wide outside off, and he leans into it, with an open face, between cover and cover-point. The heavy outfield keeps them down to two
short of a length, outside off, moving away, placed with an open face, gets a single to third man
stays short of a length, gets it to rise towards the chest, Shafiq is on his toes to defend
bouncer, 143ks, over the stumps, ducks under it
short, down the leg, flicked off the hip for one
fuller, outswinger, just outside off, his feet are caught in the crease, but he defends well
yorker, but sliding down leg, and while saving his toe, he gets enough bat to glance it down for the first boundary of the innings
inswinger, shaping in towards top of off, defended to mid-on
swinging into middle and a leg, clipped away to long leg for one
bowls the straighter one but starts too wide outside off to make him play
inswinger now, on a length, shaping in towards off stump, defended to cover
loose shot. Short of a length, wide of off, the one that doesn't swing in, and he drives at it without getting close to it. Lucky to not edge it

Did he get outside the line? Asoka doesn't think so. welcome back, Asoka. Another big inswinger, surely headed for off and middle. Beats the inside edge, but Azhar has got forward and is hit outside the line of off
length ball, middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
length ball on off, defended solidly
